name: A historian's family history
description:
"Down the rabbit hole. To use drugs that alter your state of mind."

A short story made into a game for the WAG challenge.

The game is a Twine-based story. The game is accessible and playable through a web browser. Use the following link to gain access to the game.

http://philome.la/Skilvrel/a-historians-family-his...

I apologise for the lack of polish.
